entry.title: CoreMIDI小记
entry.content:
做了MIDI半年多了，也该为这个库做点贡献了，毕竟这是一个少有人用的库，冷不丁一用还真有点难。和硬件交互没有啥简单的事，都是摸着石头过河。摸摸更健康。

由于这篇文章是中文的，同时也免不了对一些英文博客的引用，因此引用会写在最后，用双语标出。

话说，在iOS MIDI界一定要提的就是Gene De Lisa大神，人家码出来的代码就是能用，虽然，有时候不太工整吧。在我的这段历程中，少不了参考这位大神的，虽然总是没什么用，但是多少会给我一点启发。

最简单的MIDI包发送实现

感觉对于初学者来讲，上苹果官网花半天看了一遍document，看完之后感觉比看之前还糊涂。其实先看看成品代码也没什么不好的

是不是So Easy? 执行完这段代码，你就可以给你的MIDI设备发一个指令了。代码中p1,p2,p3是MIDI包中的数据，规则详见MIDI标准.
当然接收MIDI消息，也可以用类似的机制。另外，在发送的接收消息的时候，推荐使用多线程，因为在发送，接收的同时，你可能还会要求iOS系统播放，或者显示这些消息，一旦时间花销很大，可能会影响整个音乐的节奏。

简单解释一下上面的代码吧~

声明并初始化client和port,这个是发送指令之前必须要干的，在发送之前要明确给谁发，从哪里发。实际上，这段代码千篇一律，基本在所有使用CoreMIDI的代码中都需要。

之后，读过developer文档的同学应该都知道，MIDI指令的data要藏在MIDIPacket里面,MIDIPacket要藏在MIDIPacketList里面，装的方法就是用MIDIPacketListAdd方法。一个MIDIPacketList里面可以有多个MIDIpacket，这样就可以做到向外面发送多个连续的包。在MIDIPacketListAdd方法中，值得一提的是第三个参数，表示packet的生效时间，在上面的例子中传的是0，表示NOW（即时生效），也可以增加其他的MIDI时间量。

最后MIDISend在for循环中，向所有MIDI设备都发一遍MIDIPacketList,此时，在你的MIDI设备上便会有响应了。当然，如果你能确定在众多的MIDI Destination中哪一个是你真正的target，也可以直接进行send.

At last, CoreMIDI库中当然不仅仅有上述这几个方法，但是上面提到的可以说是一定会被用到。有关其他关于MIDI有趣的Point，我会以后再补充。

另外，关于MIDISendSysEx()的Info也非常有意思，因为不常用，在这里不赘述了。

Thanks to Gene De Lisa‘s Post and all his great effort and passion on both music and programming.

entry.title: .cat 域名小计
entry.content:
这个博客写了两年了吧，看了看还真没啥有用的东西，还是坚持写下去吧，至少给自己留一点记忆。

前天弄了个shuttle.cat的域名，刚开始买了半天没买到，人家说支付宝到账要check3天，我太着急了，cancel了好几遍订单。最后被划走了3次钱，现在都没找回来呢。最后还是光光帮忙把他买下来了。

然后这个域名和以往的域名不一样，他有两条特殊规定：

  1. You must develop activities (in any language) that promote the Catalan language and culture
  2. You will publish a website on the internet, within 6 months following Your .CAT domain name registration, which must be fully or partly in Catalan language.

比较硬性的规定就是要用加泰罗尼亚语弄个网页。然后呢，简单wiki之后就可以发现，这个加泰罗尼亚语大概就是巴萨罗那那块说的话，大概和西班牙语差不多吧。

因此，我又马上向我的墨西哥小伙伴问了问，他告诉了我这些：

  • Well I don’t know Catalan, but is like a mixture of Spanish with France and Portuguese
  • A bit explanation is that the real name of the Spanish is “castellano” is another region from Spain but since when they conquer America the king of Spain was from that region they used to speak it and then became the Spanish language and Catalan is from “Cataluña” other region.
  • Even today if you go to there they will speak in Catalan

综上。这个cat语还是和西语不一样的，所以翻译的时候还是按照cat语翻吧~ 然后就是一段故事，大概就是说cat语和西语同样历史悠久，而且沿袭至今。
大概就这样啦。所以买.cat域名的小伙伴们还是准备好翻译再买吧。续费也真心不便宜。但是.cat还是很靓的呢！

entry.title: iOS 读书笔记 - 1
entry.content:
第一章

The object that received the message is called target

接收消息的一方叫做target

The message sent is called the action

发出的消息叫做action

这章主要是手把手教着做了个app，没啥干货

第二章

Cocoa Touch Frameworks are collections of objective-C class

Cocoa Touch框架是oc的一组类

In Objective-C,we typically put an underscore at the begining of the instance varible name.

在oc中，一般在实例变量前面加一个下划线

The important difference between C structure and an Objective-C class is that a class has methods

c的结构和oc的类的主要不同点在于oc的类有方法

AClass Instance = [[AClass alloc] init];

分配内存并初始化

  • receiver: a pointer to the object being asked to excute a method
  • receiver:一个指向将要执行该方法的对象的指针
  • selector: the name of method to be excuted
  • selector: 方法的名字
  • argument: the values to be supplied as the parameters to the methods
  • argument: 方法的参数
Ainstance = nil;

最简单的释放内存的方法

a message sent to nil is ignored

一个向空指针发送的消息会被忽略

NSObject有三个方法 alloc、init和description

这三个方法可以被子类重写

for (NSString *item in items)

You can nit use it if you need to add or remove objects within the loop.

快枚举不能用于增删对象

Objective-C only allows single inheritance, so every class can only has one super class

oc只允许单继承，因此每个类只允许有一个父类

Each initializer begin with the word init

构造函数必须以init开头

designated initializer must initialize all the varibles

designated initializer必须初始化全部变量

instancetype can only be used in return type

instancetype只能用于返回类型

But in objective-C, you can not have two methods with the same selector and different return types

在oc，你不能有同名且参数或返回类型不同的方法

id is defined as a pointer to any object

id是一个指向任何对象的指针

isa pointer is a pointer to its class

isa指针是指向一个对象的类的指针，他描述了obj is a class

entry.content:
加入GC一年了吧
现在成了社长，今天带着大家去参观了Google北京
Google里面条件真是好，只有看了才知道
也算是完成了今年的一大活动啦吧

Kathy介绍了好多，小伙伴们也各有感悟，
总之还是说好的比较多

一切都是高大上的样子

而且有幸进了UTA的Program

真希望以后到美帝之后可以去Google实习两天

我一直在感叹上帝一直眷顾我
自己真的应该在努力一点
再真诚一点
再善良一点
珍惜自己拥有的一切
付出更多自己可以付出的东西

entry.title: Setup Mac/iOS VPN configuation using XML & PHP
entry.content:
Q: How to set up VPN in a quick way?
A: Use a config file.

In Mac/iOS, there’s a build in config file developed by Apple - *.mobileconfig, here is the description on fileinfo.

Configuration file created for iPhone and iPod touch devices; contains device setup information, such as password policies, access permissions, and proxy connection information, as well as VPN, email, and calendar settings; commonly used for deploying and registering Apple device configurations within enterprise networks.

This kind of configuation file is commonly used in fast config of muti-devices. In addition, if you are providing some service you can also use this kind of file.

Generally speaking, building such a file need an Apple developed software called Apple Configurator, and you can enter your information into this software and than export a “.mobileconfig” file.

This is a good way, however, this is not a intellgent way. Because for most users, setting up VPN config is a little bit complex and time consuming. What they really need is a UI that only need you to enter their account name and their password. That would be perfect.

So you should do something behind this beautiful interface. You should know the structure of the .mobileconfig file, and figure out where to save the username ans where to save the password.So I figured it out. It is actually a XML file using DTD provided by apple. In this XML file, your configuration is saved.

<?xml version=\”1.0\” encoding=\”UTF-8\”?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC \”-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN\” \”http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd\">

With all these information supported, it’s not hard for us to build a php file which receive the HTTP POST request from the front end and generate such a XML file on your server. This XML file contains the unique user info and your server info. If you want to change your server, just correct the XML and let users login to re-download the mobileconfig file.

The last but not the least, you still need to sign your mobileconig file to make it safe and relible. To sign your config file, use this:

openssl smime -sign -signer path/to/crt -inkey path/to/key -certfile path/to/ca-bundle -nodetach -outform der -in name.mobileconfig -out profile_signed.mobileconfig

Everything will be alright then.

entry.title: 域名转出记
entry.content:
有朋友说域名在国内容易有可能被HOLD，加上自己的域名马上就要到期了，因此痛下决心要把域名转到国外的服务商那里去。

我的域名是在中国互联购买的，废了半天劲找回了密码然后登入账户写ticket申请域名转出，在下周一就得到了回复，要求我联系qq客服。

当然，域名要转出其实根本不用联系客服，只要你有域名授权密码就行。但是在中国互联的控制页面上死活也找不到密码。于是，只能继续联系客服。

于是我转战qq，客服人员确认了我的身份之后，冷冷的问了一句：“为什么要转出呢”，顿时问的我有点晕，我是这样回答的：“希望挂到国外的提供商去。因为我希望申请国外的研究生。国外解析会可靠一点”。然后客服没有再回答我，直接给我转了另一个客服。另一个客服给我发来了一堆东西：

域名转出： 域名所有者是个人的 ：
1.免责申明书 填好打印手写签字
2.转出表格填好 打印手写签字
3.身份证 正反面复印件 在上面签字
4.以上资料请邮寄至我司；

域名所有者是公司的：
1.免责申请书 填好打印盖公司公章
2.转出表格填好 打印 盖公司公章
3.联系人身份证 正反面复印件 在上面签字
4.公司营业执照副本 复印件 在上面盖公司公章
5.以上资料请邮寄至我司；

注：域名专员收到资料 审核没问题 会在7个工作日内给域名所有者邮箱发转出确认邮件 确认回复后 发转出密码 请注意查收邮件

所以，没什么可说的了，既然人家这么要求了，就按照人家的要求一步一步的做，折腾完这一套文书之后，我就顺风给那边公司寄了过去。过了一两天顺风提示我快件被签收，又过了一天，客服发邮件告诉我，要求我用域名管理邮箱发域名转出确认信。于是我就用admin@domain.name又发了一封确认信。翌日，中国互联就把域名的密码发给我了。

然后，我又跟我的域名接收方Europe Registry说我终于知道我域名的转出密码了，让他们赶快帮我转出。
ps1. 之所以选择这么个奇葩的域名接收方是因为我的域名比较小众，不像.com那样的那里都可以接受。
ps2. 域名转出貌似有规矩，刚注册几个月之内貌似不能转出，而且转出的同时必须续费。这个具体要咨询域名提供商。

很快，Europe Registry那边就回复了，说我的域名密码正确，转出已经开始初始化。两星期之后，我发现域名依然没有成功转出，然后又给Europe Registry发工单问问什么情况了，然后Europe Registry那边回复告诉我说我的密码还不对，让我给他们发正确的密码。。。然后我就急了，就把2周前那个成功初始化的邮件又给他发了回去。

Hi….
I am really confused about the status of the domain domain.name
In the mail 【[#UFW-893-78144]: Re: Incorrect Domain Password for domain.name】,you told me that【The auth code was correct, and the domain transfer has been initiated.】that happened in Aug 14th.
However, when I asked you about how is my transfer going yesterday, you answered me in this mail【[#XMR-810-35537]: Transfer about domain.name】that【Unfortunately the authorization code you have provided for the transfer of your domain is being rejected by the registry as incorrect.】
Please tell me what is wrong with that? I paste my passcode again here.
DOMAIN:
Password:
Target: Europe Registry

In addition I am sure this authorization code is correct.

Thanks
By Jialin

然后他回复跟我说，是他搞错了，实际上你的域名已经转出完成（我汗…），他会转告技术部门最后结束我域名的transfer. 过了一天，我接到邮件，说我域名转出完成。又过了一天，在Europe Registry的控制面板上就可以对域名进行各种操作了。

总的来讲，这次转出大概用了一个月的时间，来来回回写申请，寄东西，发工单还有最后Europe Registry那边长时间的没反应耽误了好多时间。能转出成功还是要说这两边的客服还不错。转出了而且续期了，顿时有一种神清气爽的感觉。

entry.title: 分别季
entry.content:
今天是6月17日，7月12日就要离开葡萄牙了。只有不到一个月的时间了。有时候甚至没有心情去旅游，只想静静的呆在朋友们的身边。
国内的好多朋友很久不见了。19号意平又要回台湾。佳佳那货每天就知道没心没肺的忙考试。感觉全世界都怪怪的。没有一个每天都陪你的人，就是会没有安全感。
回国要面对好多事，补考、重修、托福、GRE、课设、毕设、申请。感觉就要没有时间了。室友说，如果他没拿到奖学金，他就要休学去找工作，因为他没有足够的钱继续读下去了。相反我们有多幸福啊。。。
感觉，有的时候不要给自己太大压力，想想来到IST也是不错的。毕竟确实能学到好多东西。是一所不错的大学。你在这里，是不是已经熟识了很多人。知道了很多事。经历了很多寂寞，然而让你更熟悉了这个城市。相比北京的喧嚣，这里更多的是自由与没有打扰。这就是不同之处吧。但是谁知道，如果再回来，这个里斯本还是你认识的里斯本吗？
总有好多事，我不愿意去想，毕竟想也没用。因为根本不可能改变。。。分别是必须要经历的，不管是和这个城市分别，还是和这里的人分别。这样的场景完全不会回来了。这些人，永远凑不到一起了。就是这样。俗俗的说一句，天下没有不散的宴席，室友跟我说他离开印度的时候也是做着相同的心里准备的。不知道为什么，虽然是个“工程师”，有时候我就是接受不了这些事。
从albufeira回来之后就一直很烦乱。静不下心来，而且还一直都很疲劳。身体累，心更累，希望明天可以振作起来。好好看看OOP。后天考完，这里的学业也就结束了。
祝大家安好。

Well you only need the light when it’s burning low
Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
Only know you love her when you let her go
Only know you’ve been high when you’re feeling low
Only hate the road when you’re missin’ home
Only know you love her when you let her go

And you let her go

entry.title: 科维良——落幕
entry.content:
#咖啡馆补餐
一天天过的真的好快，眼看着Cluster4打完了，4场异常全部结束。我们拖着疲惫的身躯和没电的手机在2号Po旁边的咖啡馆照了一张相。

此时我发现了我的iphone手机充电线断了。因此我的手机无法充电。一会还有游泳的活动和party。。。旁边一帮人都是用安卓的。这边周末所有商店根本不开。。眼看就要跪了。。这个时候Bruno跟我说他的车上有个转接头。因此我才安心的继续和他们一起呆着。

#游泳池晒太阳
过了一会大概吃完了吧，（我们都没吃，老外也是靠吃面包过来的，幸亏早饭吃的多，我一直在等晚上party狂吃，因为他们聊天，我也没啥话说，就得吃吃吃）Bruno夫妇回车上准备回家，我跟着队长老婆和Nuno去游泳池，我没带游泳裤，只能在旁边无聊的看美女，喝藿香正气和晒太阳。。。
过了一会Bruno过来了，给我送来了安卓转iphone的转接口，又给手机冲上了电。。。又过了不大一会，队长过来了，他和Nuno一起开始游泳。。。我接着无聊。不过借到了队长的安卓线，我就开始给手机充电，然后回答王熠晨的奇怪问题。。等他们玩爽了，队长送我们回旅店。

#After Party
回酒店自然是开音乐，洗澡，换身衣服～差不多到点了就出去和Nuno汇合，然后一会队长的车就过来接我们了。经过一段不短的行程，我们到了After Party的地方。开始所有人都没有进去，在外面聊天，看到了Nuno Cunha和他wife Layla,然后他们聊聊聊我也听不懂，之后估计在外面站累了，蓝军入场，然后绿军入场，然后我们找了个大桌子坐。。。我最后没地方坐到了桌子的一边。

他们说，坐在这边的人要请客，这是规矩（竟然如此嘲讽我。。。。）然后聊聊聊，有的时候看我太无聊了就用英语说两句，没事干的时候我就在一边吃吃吃。不过吃的东西味道真的很正。还是葡萄牙人会选地方，前菜是汤，超好喝！咸淡正好，虽然看起来跟食堂的差不多吧，但是味道说不出来有多好喝（原谅我吧，可能是我一天没吃东西的缘故），接下来主菜可以选土豆泥或者【奇怪的鸡肉香肠加土豆】，最后我选了后者，因为肉多，真是相当好吃啊！期间左边的大叔跟我讨论了蛋炒饭，说每一个中国餐厅都有类似的东西。。。叫做【chao chao rice…】我也是醉了，虽然没怎么明白他在说什么吧。。。但是。。。聊了两句。我的正左边是一个小哥，貌似是那个跟我聊炒米饭的大叔的儿子（或者孙子），他很腼腆基本不说话。。典型的工科生。。。马上master毕业了。住在法鲁，过两天去法鲁的时候也许可以约他打Po呢。。。过了一会Nuno Cunha又来调戏我，问我在干啥，我说在给成就Po充电。然互他就又开始跟我说我的成就是Layla申的，她还有Key呢＝＝。。【我受到了惊吓】，然后又在说我在科英布拉时做他的车打Po胆子小（废话。。。我肯定没事啊。。你开着车还打Po这车我哪敢坐啊，就差系安全带了。。），然后我又受到了大家的取笑。。。总之很开心。。
虽然没有吃的很爽吧（因为不是自助），但是毕竟食物很好吃。之后我被队长顺道送回了旅店，路上他和我吐槽他老婆其实是不玩ingress的。。但是为了怕他和其他女人。。。也就是为了查岗，这次特意和他一起过来。。。（其实Bruno也跟我说过类似的话，葡萄牙的女人好可怕）路上我们又聊了一些乱七八糟的话题，而且约了，明天让队长接我回家，到了旅馆，我也就洗洗睡了，之后队长应该又回去继续party了，不过12点多了。。。我就不嘬了。。。

#Dawn
第二天同样早早的起来，上午抓紧时间刷Po。准备把所有的UPC和UPV都搞定，顺便做任务，不过这边的任务真的太坑了。。。我也就没怎么做。上午就是绕绕绕，至少把城区po最密的地方饶了一遍了吧，能占的都占了。任务貌似就做了2个，实在太虐了。。。然后就往回走，走到离旅馆比较近的教堂，看到一个蓝po，打打打！废了300多个8炸也没炸掉，不过得了30w的AP，也就半小时吧，还是很爽的，我一想快到12点了，还是回去checkout吧，然后就回去，收拾东西，在床上躺会，拿好所有东西，checkout，坐等队长。然后。。。。就没等来，一看快2点了。就一边刷po一边往火车站走。结果路上收到了队长的消息，然后我有往回走，最后在昨天绿军集合的地方我上车，他接我回里斯本。。在车上我已经很累了。差点睡着了。。。中间收费站休息一次，上了个厕所，先去Nuno家给他插脚，然后把我送到了Moscavide门口。。。我们下车，我从他包里取走了昨天的纪念品，然后回到了宿舍。

#Twilight
回家，收拾collection，把海贼王补了，睡觉，第二天起床上学，准备还Bruno那个转换器，在civil吃了饭，到造币厂门口，开始hack，然后竟然聚了6个人，我把转换器给Bruno，结果他说不用了。。反正我也不用。。。诶。。。葡萄牙人真TM好。。。然后他们请我喝了cafe，我们又聊起了前天的事情，还历历在目，队长还跟另一个大叔说我前天守第四个Po的时候使劲插紫盾，结果插完就被打掉，插完就被打掉，因为VR的盾都用完了。。。大家都很开心。。。
我也终于写完了这次记录。。。但是呢。。。我还没有复习。。周一就这么水了哈哈哈哈哈哈哈。。

#END

本篇文章 由 Jialin 创作，采用 知识共享 署名-非商业性使用-相同方式共享 4.0 国际 许可协议进行许可。

entry.title: 科维良——Battle Control
entry.content:
#Sun Rise
周六，一大早可能有点激动吧，8点多就爬起来，闹钟都没用上，洗澡，下楼吃美味的早餐自助。开始问队长+Filipe “Chycha”Azevedo啥时候集合，然后他说他也不知道。哈哈哈。等消息，最后说10：30，大概10点走出去，10分钟就到了集合地点。看到了队长。和副队长，葡萄牙绿军领袖Nuno Ferreira，热情的握手，打招呼。然后。。。他们一帮人开始聊。。。我就没啥聊的（听不懂葡语呀。。）在后面听着。最后估计是太阳越来越热了大家决定去旁边的咖啡馆坐会。他们做成一团，我依然在旁边绕。。。
过了一会，人越聚越多，然后Bruno Bruges Grade在Tg上问你们在哪里，给他发了个位置就出去接他。然后看到他和他Wife一起来，我们进去，他招呼我坐到了大家身边，我们坐了一大桌。感觉好舒服～虽然他们还是基本用葡语聊吧。。。不过。。。感觉就不一样了。。。

#Enlightened
须臾，有消息说那边开始签到了，于是他们纷纷过去排队，我就留了下来等Bruno夫妇，等匆匆喝完咖啡之后，我们一起回到广场签到。实际上签到就是一袋子东西，里面有牌子，贴画，Res的卡，牌子的卡，然后就是买T恤，之后又排一队领胸牌。然后又是大家凑到一起聊天。等了一会大家东西都领完了就是啪啪啪使劲照相。然后，宣布队伍集结，开始干活。

#Cluster1
延小路直接走到目标Po。占领，起八，守。中途有些人去执行特别任务了，估计是去增援其他组了。我们这里经过一系列骚扰，稳稳地把2个Po保了下来。过了一会异常结束，出去的人也归队，我们去了另一个Cluster。

###Persepolis: Covilhã - Measurement 1 Report
The Enlightened captured this Measurement, 107 to 83.
The Enlightened currently control this Satellite Site, leading by 24.

Portals Owned - RES: 16 - ENL: 16 - [Value: 1 each]
Volatile Portals Owned - RES: 7 - ENL: 1 - [Value: 6 each]
Links Created - RES: 5 - ENL: 17 - [Value: 5 each]
Anchored Fields Created - RES: 0 - ENL: 0 - [Value: 10 each]
Single Field Over Entire Cluster - NONE - [Value: 75]
Total for this Measurement:
Resistance - 83 - Enlightened - 107
Total for this Satellite Site:
Resistance - 83 - Enlightened - 107

#Cluster2
接下来，我们去第二个地点，依然是2个Po，我继续做deployer。我们人很多，虽然中间Bruno又消失了，但是把Po保护的稳稳地。期间明显有蓝军势力打得很厉害，不过Po一直都没有掉，而且基本都是recharge的节奏。

打完第二轮之后，我们知道了，我们第一轮赢了。大家都高兴的飞起～

###Persepolis: Covilhã - Measurement 2 Report
The Resistance captured this Measurement, 138 to 39.
The Resistance currently control this Satellite Site, leading by 75.
Portals Owned - RES: 21 - ENL: 21 - [Value: 1 each]
Volatile Portals Owned - RES: 7 - ENL: 3 - [Value: 6 each]
Links Created - RES: 0 - ENL: 0 - [Value: 5 each]
Anchored Fields Created - RES: 0 - ENL: 0 - [Value: 10 each]
Single Field Over Entire Cluster - RES - [Value: 75]

Total for this Measurement:
Resistance - 138 - Enlightened - 39

Total for this Satellite Site:
Resistance - 221 - Enlightened - 146

从上面的数据看，我们普通po拥有数量和蓝军一样，但是Volatile Portals少了好多，并且蓝军有个大Field一直罩着科维良，这个一直没打掉，输了很多。

#Cluster3
接着开往第三轮，由于大家都没吃午饭，所以好多人在路上买了面包吃，但是一向拮据的我才不管那么多呢。顶多坐在旁边等等他们。
第三轮我们的目标Po好像是在科维良大学的旁边。主要靠我和DaddyPT合作，开始打，之后守，过程很激烈，守的很不容易，我记得最后好像是守住了。

###Persepolis: Covilhã - Measurement 3 Report

The Resistance captured this Measurement, 235 to 71.
The Resistance currently control this Satellite Site, leading by 239.

Portals Owned - RES: 25 - ENL: 18 - [Value: 1 each]
Volatile Portals Owned - RES: 10 - ENL: 3 - [Value: 6 each]
Links Created - RES: 18 - ENL: 7 - [Value: 5 each]
Anchored Fields Created - RES: 6 - ENL: 0 - [Value: 10 each]
Single Field Over Entire Cluster - NONE - [Value: 75]

Total for this Measurement:
Resistance - 235 - Enlightened - 71

Total for this Satellite Site:
Resistance - 456 - Enlightened - 217

在这之前好像那个大Field被打掉了，所以那个75分的增益没有了，但是蓝军明显在这一轮以绝对优势领先。没准是在外面做大Field的人回来了？

#Cluster4
最后一轮，我们队好像管了3个Po，我和Bruno夫妇管第二个，开始占Po，起八都很正常。。。然后大家都累了，决定去旁边咖啡馆坐一会（此时我的手机已经快没电了，在科英布拉买的苹果线坏了）。刚刚坐下，服务员就过来问你们要点什么，我说我要咖啡。咖啡还没上，Bruno跟我说，3号Po需要支援，让我过去，我就匆匆喝完咖啡，结账，此时发现我们的Po被打掉了。因此还没来得及去3号Po。我们就开始返攻2号Po。我俩一起炸，最后炸掉了。开始deploy。炸的时候要在Po中心炸，插脚的时候要离开Po插。就这样：炸炸炸；或者插脚插Mod充电。花了不少东西。最后我们成功控制了那个Po

###Persepolis: Covilhã - Measurement 4 Report

The Enlightened captured this Measurement, 175 to 168.
The Resistance captured this Satellite Site, outperforming the Enlightened by 232.

Portals Owned - RES: 22 - ENL: 20 - [Value: 1 each]
Volatile Portals Owned - RES: 6 - ENL: 5 - [Value: 6 each]
Links Created - RES: 14 - ENL: 17 - [Value: 5 each]
Anchored Fields Created - RES: 4 - ENL: 4 - [Value: 10 each]
Single Field Over Entire Cluster - NONE - [Value: 75]

Total for this Measurement:
Resistance - 168 - Enlightened - 175

Total for this Satellite Site:
Resistance - 624 - Enlightened - 392

这次绿军做的link比较多。控制了局面。但是由于第二轮第三轮的劣势，这次又仅仅是微弱优势，已经无法挽回了。所以总分还是输了。

entry.title: 科维良——启程
entry.content:
在葡萄牙，每次都喜欢在火车上没事干的时候瞎写写，有闲时吧生活记录下来也是好的，尽管没有别人会看到，尽管自己也不会再去看，也算是把生活一点一点沉淀下来。。

#这周的考试
先记录一下在之前发生的事吧，要从这周考试说起了吧，这周一是Robotic考试，周三是TeleSys 3rd Mini Test,周五是机器人验收。

###Rob 2nd Midterm
也就是说，从周末开始，就要开始复习机器人了，只可惜机器人这门课不能交换学分而且真的好难好难，复习动力不足，最后大概是放弃了吧。反正Mid term只有3分（这边满分是20），所以最后就把开放题写的满满的。剩下基本啥都没写。

###TeleSys 3rd Mini
至于周三的TeleSys，开始看了2遍PPT直接上战场，本来TeleSys的Mini Test就不占分，所以就更不重视了。但是最后感觉很好，不知道能不能得A呢。。。

###Rob Lab2
所以说，几乎一整周都在做机器人实验，实验占的时间多，占的分也多，一个学期就2个机器人实验，而且这个马上就验收了，因此我们给予了必要的重视，把【机器人】2nd Lab作为本周安排的重中之重，只可惜感觉我们做的思路很不对，人家都是根据启动点生成路径然后用坐标传感器分析位置信息，结合声纳进行实验的，而我们只用了声纳。这肯定给我们带来了很多困扰，因为声纳的数据很不稳定，有各种反射或吸收。所以我们组的成功概率一直有问题。
开始的时候找老师测试了3次，均以失败告终，老师最后都有点不耐烦了，就说你们回去看看你们的代码除了什么问题！
其实问题很简单，就是人太多了，声纳数据全是乱的，全都瞎反射。于是我们垂头丧气的回去，把机器给别人用，自己坐在角落该玩电脑玩电脑，该玩手机玩手机，代码实在没啥好调的，都调过不知道多少遍了。代码存在架构问题，也不是一两分钟可以搞定的。
过了大概半个小时吧。我们把3号儿子拿了回来（我们管机器人叫儿子），再次开始测试。这几次都算正常发挥，但是数据还是不准，机器人还是会Crash。这时候我的脑海中就浮现出了意萍和上帝的桥段，要不试试祈祷一下，让上帝帮帮忙～
所以，这次测试之前，我就花了5秒钟向上帝祈祷了一下，跟他说，如果这次我们的机器人跑成了，我就读10遍圣经。结果跑成了，但是老师没看着，所以不算数。。。下一次，叫上了老师，又花了5秒钟，跟上帝说，要是这次跑成了，就读30遍。。。结果跑的时候，前面还是比较顺利的，我一边跟老好死聊天，彭聪在前面控这机器人，虽然有很多小动作，但是都很顺利。在期间老师给我讲反射的事情。。。嗯。收获不少，机器人也走到了第四道的最后，准备转回实验室。这个时候，第二次测验的错误好像又犯了，机器人笔直往前走也不往实验室拐，眼看就撞墙了。。。这个时候他突然拐了。。。然后开进了实验室，成功完成了实验。。。。当时所以在门口的同学们都大声尖叫！！！我都快笑傻了。。。老师也无奈的说”This is not science!!“（难道这就是上帝喽？）
因此，我们就这样通过了机器人的测评。但是我算是欠下了上帝40遍圣经。不过请人办事确实是得付出点代价的。事后我问意萍，读一遍圣经要多长时间？意萍跟我说，大概要一年吧。。。哈哈。。一会到旅馆网ibook里下载一个慢慢读吧。

##Ingress的大叔
葡国人给我们最深的印象就是热情。而且他们也确实热情，会事事为你着想。当时刚来里斯本的时候我也是怀着一腔热情玩ingress，期待着认识一些当地人，不过在公频里吼。。。纷纷失败。一度要放弃这个游戏。然后就听说了科维良的XM异常。这机会一定得抓住啊。这可是给牌子的东西。。。于是我又开始各种勾搭大叔。直接联系葡萄牙绿军领袖（前两天去科英布拉面过的）。当时我都忘了在哪里找到了Nuno cunha这个人。反正就开始联系，然后他说他不在里斯本，就把我介绍给了里斯本的Nuno，之后他又把我介绍给了造币厂的布鲁诺大叔。于是，我就认识了造币厂的好多好多人。。。真开心。也就是他们教我如何用画图hack。我也因此受益不少。来葡萄牙之后，先后在里斯本，塞图巴尔，马德里，波尔图和科英布拉狂刷，得了2个牌子上了11级。现在正在去科维良的路上。
葡萄牙的大叔真的很好，我主动要求跟他们一队，他们就把我加了进来，带我一起定制T恤。现在包里应该放着这次的T恤。明天要穿出去了。

希望明天一切顺利
Let’s enlighten the world
By Cater
May 29, 2015

entry.title: Learning Baysian Network
entry.content:
Outline

In this project, a BN and a DBN is learned from the given data using Greedy Hill Climbing and random restarts. A directed graph without any edge is seen as the initial graph, then an algorithm called GHC is used and with this method, a better structure is found step by step supported by the scoring function, until a situation that every neighbor of the current status have lower score then the current, then random restart is executed. In this way, the best structure will be get. After that, parameter of this structure can be calculate so that inference can be done to predict the value.

Basic Steps

BN StructureLearning

At the very beginning, structure learning is necessary to find out the best-scored structure in BN.
With the initial network which has N vertex generated by the data class, in every step in GHC, program will find out the better scored structure in its neighbor, that structure will be seem as current structure. In this way, the current structure will be better and better until the program find a structure that all its neighbor have lower score, that means, a local best is found. To deal with this situation, random restart will be executed, a random graph generator will be called and a new random graph will be returned as the current structure, then GHC is applied again. After several times of random restart, a global best is found.
In the progress above, a TABU list is also applied when checking the neighbor of the current structure, if the neighbor is in the TABU list, ignore it and check the next one, else, calculate its score and add it into TABU list.

DBN StructureLearning

Analogously, structure learning in DBN also use GHC algorithm, random restart and TABU lists. The difference is that structure learning in GHC has 2N vertex(Which is double number of BN), but has no edge from time t to time t or for time t+1 to time t. When learning DBN structures, if a vertex has 3 parent vertex, which is the max number of a vertex, there will not any additional edge points to it.

ParameterLearning

In this step, probabilities should be determined given the optimal structure with certain standard.In the constructor, the test data is given for the program to learn the best structure,
parameterLearning(dyllscore d1,data data1);
Knowing all the parameters , is given by the following expression:


Note that: N’ are pseudo-counts, which equals 0.5 in this project.
The above formula can be described by the following program:

for(int i=0; i<2*p_numberofnode; i++){="" for(int="" j="0;" j ls= digraph1.getPais(data1.getVl().get(n));
Transfer the array of parent nodes in string to integer for convenience. Iterate the rll, determine the number of parents configurations


After that given the number of nodes, the number of parent configurations of each nodes, number of different values of each nodes, iterate the whole data file,


each set of values is corresponding to a certain count[][][],


Then, it is easy to get the value of counts[][] given the count[][][],


Finally, apply log-likelihood algorithm with all the given parameters to get the final result in the Bayesian network.

Note that: is count[i][j][k] and is counts[i][j].

MDLscore

Minimum description length is another scoring criterion in this project, all the initialization is done in the constructor.

the score of the structure by using minimum description length algorithm can be achieved through the expression below:

Note that: is the total number of instances, and denotes the network complexity, which is given by:

DyLLscore

In the terms of the log-likelihood score in the dynamic Bayesian network, the calculation is basically the same as it is in the Bayesian network. The difference only lies on the number of nodes, which needs to take careful consideration. Because it depends on two states, the number of nodes in each sets we should be two times of the actual number of nodes.

DyMDLscore

In the terms of the minimum description length score in the dynamic Bayesian network comparing to it in the Bayesian network, the only difference also lies on the number of nodes in each set.

Efficiency

Array, ArrayList and LinkedList

The time complexity comparison is as follows:


add() in the table refers to add(E e), and remove() refers to remove(int index)
ArrayList has O(n) time complexity for arbitrary indices of add/remove, but O(1) for the operation at the end of the list.
LinkedList has O(n) time complexity for arbitrary indices of add/remove, but O(1) for operations at end/beginning of the List.
The difference of their performance is obvious.

LinkedList is faster in add and remove, but slower in get. Based on the complexity table and testing results, we can figure out when to use ArrayList or LinkedList. In brief, LinkedList should be preferred if:
there are no large number of random access of element
there are a large number of add/remove operations
In our project, the data class need only add data once(The data never changes), but is read several times, so ArrayList is a good choice for data. For other small data structures, LinkedList is seem in high efficiency, and sometimes for the small length-fixed structures, array is used.

### Directed Graph(Adjacency matrix or adjacency list)
Adjacency matrix or adjacency list? When facing this problem, it is important to make a decision for that to continue our project. It can not only have impact on the efficiency of the program but also can influence the stability. Multiple factor is considered in our project, as listed below.

As can be seen in the chart above. An adjacency matrix occupy much more space in the memory, and adjacency list just save what it need. However, adjacency matrix have a higher speed to find a specific edge, but it is slower to iterate though the graph.
In our project, it is rare to have a graph with more than 20 vertex, so it will not occupy lots of memory. What’s more, we always need to look up parents of a specific vertex, which need to Iterate though the graph, so a data structure using adjacency list is generated.

Data Structure in Parameter Learning

As we known, the score is typically based on the count[ ][ ][ ] and the counts[ ][ ] in this project. However, iterating the whole data is time-consuming. So we need to estimate the number of different values in each of the dimensions when they are initialized.
Although the number of count[ ][ ][ ] and counts[ ][ ] is fixed given the structure, it is impossible to determine how many parent configurations or even which nodes are the parents of a certain node. So in order not to receive exceptions in the project. We initial the count[ ][ ][ ] and count[ ][ ] with maximum value for secure purpose. Also it turns out to save the memories comparing to the condition if we initialize them with a relatively large number.

Polymorphic

Polymorphic in scoring function

The scoring function is where we implement the polymorphism to redefine the method resultOfScore based on different kinds of scoring criterion. Concerning that there are various kinds of algorithm to score and select the best structure independently. We provide the base class scoringfunction where all the attributes are declared in this class.
Also, we made the scoringfunction class an abstract class with an abstract method resultOfScore, so you can’t not initialize an object of scoringfunction type, instead the specific type is recommended at the beginning.

Polymorphic in Structure Learning

The structure learning functions also use polymorphic to make it possible to extend other possible solutions in a gentle way. in our project, structure learning function is like the graph below.
As can be seen in the graph, the Learn class is abstract and it has 2 abstract function to be override and 1 function that is declared and defined. In the DLearn and SLearn classes, the function learnStructures() and dagGen() are overrided because they behave different when learning BN and DBN.

A little bit more work

After finished programming the project, we run our program several times with the sets of data given. The result sometimes appears to be concentrated on only one number, after trying to debug our program, we found that sometimes the possibility of a variable taking different values are same, and after the “find-max” iterate, the first-max value remains.
To fix that problem, we generate a random list. When the situation above is occurred, a random value with highest score is chosen.

Outcomes & conclusion

Though our program is not tested on the workstation in the Lab. We can ensure that our program can run smoothly on a windows or a Mac with 2 different scoring functions and 2 sets of data. Here is the outcome of our test data on a Macbook.

Group Member

Agradecimentos

Thank to Prof. Alexandra Carvalho supporting our project, especially for the doubt session in English, we really appreciate that!

entry.title: 回来之后
entry.content:
听着久石让的音乐
不知道心里是怎么想的
只是想找个人好好聊聊
沉淀一下这两天发生的事

认真有什么用，不认真又有什么用
信教有什么用，不信教又会怎样
民主真正是什么，不民主到底差距在哪

有的人对你好，但是他们不重要
有的人对你不好，但是偏偏在乎

听着久石让的歌
好像是一点点雨水填满了山里的沟渠
把心里的烦乱一点点解决掉了。。

coutry road
take me home
to the place
I belone

是不是又多了一个伤心之地呢?

May 12th, 2015
B122a

entry.title: 波尔图和科英布拉
entry.content:
上个周末
大概是一场说走就走的旅行
波尔图和科英布拉
2个人，3个人，3个人，2个人，4天

让我感受了与上帝最近的距离
又感受了离中国最远的距离

This coner stone
this soild groud
What hights of love
When fear are still
When Striving cease

波尔图有葡国最好的酒
这两天喝的酒要是几年之后再喝的话，我的眼泪可能会掉出来
Sandeman酒庄确实是一个有情怀的地方

波尔图有在联大学习的东北小哥
我的内心是怎么想的，我自己都不知道
多少有些别扭。。。但是依然很舒服
我知道很矛盾，但是这就是我当时内心的感受

你做不到不以物喜不以己悲
做不到真正的自己
就永远不会不受社会干扰
话说，人生活不就是为了适应社会吗
不被干扰要如何适应呢？
话说，你这次又被谁干扰了呢？
哈哈哈

我发现自己也会从一开始就对某些人感兴趣
同时也会对一些人没兴趣
你不知道他们是谁的时候就对他们有了第一印象
这不好
要改。

波尔图有高高的教堂塔
爬上去腿都抖
波尔图不是一个适合恐高的人居住的地方
虽然我恐高，但是是被吓的
这是经过多年之后的我的总结

科英布拉有葡国最好的party和最热情的请我们喝咖啡人
在哪里最有名的咖啡馆门口坐上2个小时
和旁边的葡国人聊聊天
He is from China, and I am from Taiwan
怪怪的感觉，但是莫名的觉得好舒服

不过不管你说什么，葡萄牙大叔总会暖暖的朝你笑
这时候你会忍不住朝他傻傻的笑
有的时候彼此听不懂说什么
但是感觉我们的心里都有着人与人之间最重要的坦诚
他最后帮我们结了帐
可能，这辈子再也不会见到他了

There in ground
His body lays
Light of the world by darkness slain

科英布拉有最热情的葡国人，开车带我hack了好几圈。。。
I trust them, but I never meet them
哈哈哈。。。你在里斯本宿舍的房间号是什么?
完成了2个任务
解释了好多问题
2个小时，依然看到了无比的热情，虽然没有升级或者得到牌子
但是可能是我玩这个游戏之后我最开心的一次

最后party，往回走的时候说了好多
我也意识到了好多
每个人的敏感程度不一样
我可以理解我自己
但是依然不能原谅我自己
好久好久没有被这样问住
有的时候“No guilt in life”也是相对的
没想到这次直接上了道德的刑场

虽然喝了不少
然后玩的很high
生活从来都是这样的出人意料的精彩
又是这样的回味无穷

Till he returned
or calls me home
Here in the love of Christ I stand

有时候虔诚的祈祷总是好的
基督教确实再把人往好的方向引导
就是不知道玩政治的人是如何看待这件事的
上帝是啥？不管信不信教都要好好思考
至少这次之后，我没有必要怀疑上帝了
因为我们追求的东西可能是相近的
他和我不再陌生
感觉他就在我身边

No guilt in life
No fear in death
This is the power of Christ in me
From life’s first cry
To final breathe
Jueis command my destiny

但愿我心不变

Bring me to the god
May 12th, 2015 on the train

entry.title: TR5 kinematics
entry.content:
1. The direct kinematics

1.1 Outline

A direct kinematics is an approach from which we can get the final position and orientation of any part of ROB3/TR5 robot. With the given 5 angles and the graph of the robot, rotation matrix is composed to describe the movements of the robot. Finally, the position described in base frame and orientation of every part of robot can be figured out.

1.2 Establishment of the coordinate system

To describe the position and the orientation of all the part of the robot, serials of coordinate system should be established as described in figure below. As can be seen in the picture, the base frame is established at the bottom of the robot.
And then, the other coordinate systems can also be established to describe the other part of the robot.

1.3 Composition of rotation matrices

Rotation matrices is needed to be composed to describing the body orientation with respect to the coordinate system. Due to the rotation of any arm is around a fixed axis of the corresponding coordinate system, the rotation matrices can be compose in the following way.
The rotation from X0-Y0-Z0 to X1-Y1-Z1 is around Z0(Z1) axis:


The rotation from X1-Y1-Z1 to X2-Y2-Z2 is around X2 axis:


The rotation from X2-Y2-Z2 to X3-Y3-Z3 is around X3 axis:


The rotation from X3-Y3-Z3 to X4-Y4-Z4 is around X4 axis:


The rotation from X4-Y4-Z4 to X5-Y5-Z5 is around Y5 axis:

1.4 Homogeneous transformations

In order to achieve a compact representation of the relationship between the coordinates of the same point in two or more different frames, homogeneous transformations is needed to achieve the goal to present the position and orientation in the base frame.
Firstly, the orientation matrix can be easily generated in the way below:


Then the position of the target point can be transformed by the following equation:


As known the coordinate of each joint in the corresponding frame. The joint’s coordinate can be easily calculated by iterative using the equation above until n=1. So the position of each joint and the end-effector is available.

1.5 Euler angles

  1. Inverse Kinematics
    2.1 Outline
    Inverse Kinematics allows us to compute the rotation angle of each joint along its certain axis under the circumstances of receiving two parameters, the position and orientation matrix of the end-effector as the input.
    In this approach, we divide the solution into three parts, the first section is to determine the P2 and θ3 based on the given condition. The second part is to figure out the P2, θ0, θ1 and θ2 by using the plane geometric method, and the last one is to implement the geometric method to locate the 4th point.
    Since the P0 and P1 won’t change its position because of the fixed structure, the function will finally return all the corresponding solutions in the angles space.

2.1 The first part:
By given the position of P3 point and the final orientation, we can get the position of the point P2 and the θ3 in this scenario.
It is rather evident that the direction of the A34 is identical with the vector of the y-axis in the final orientation. Knowing that, we extract the elements in the second column of the orientation, and then normalize the vector to 1. Along with the given position of the P3 point, the P2 point can be figured out by apply the following relationship:

In terms of the solution to θ3, firstly, we should find out two vectors, the first one with the direction along the A23 and the other one is with the direction along the A34, by implementing the geometric method, we can determine θ3 with the given relationship below:

2.2 The second part:
Given the condition of the position of P3, applying plane geometric method shown in the slides of lecture6, and through simple calculation, we can get P2, θ0, θ1 and θ2 in this part.
The figure above gives all what we want to know, we pack all the functions in the auxiliaryFunction2.
Firstly, we can determine the θ2 by:

Then we introduce two assistant angles which call β and φ, with the calculation below, we can get the value of them by:

After that, θ1 is easy to reach simply by:

Since P0 can only rotate along its z axis, so θ0 can be determined by x and y coordinates of the projection of P3 in the XOY plane through the calculation:

Finally, with all the parameters we have, P2 can be easily located.

3 A set of test

3.1 Test with random number

3.2 Test with specific number

4. Code documentation

The Matlab™ code is made up by 5 parts:

  • directKinematics.m
  • inverseKinematics.m
  • auxiliaryFunction1.m
  • auxiliaryFunction2.m
  • draw.m

You should always just execute the 【directKinematics.m】 function and the 【inverseKinematics.m】 function, other 3 functions will be automatically called when you execute the two main function.

4.1 directKinematics.m

function [P, A] = directKinematics()
Parameters: none.
Return Values:

    1. P: The position of the end-effector point;
    2. A: The Orientation of the last arm.
**Input Values:**
    1. Theta0: the rotation angle along the axis z1;
    2. Theta1: the rotation angle along the axis x1;
    3. Theta2: the rotation angle along the axis x2;
    4. Theta3: the rotation angle along the axis x3;
    5. Theta4: the rotation angle along the axis y1.
**Output Values:**
    1. Orientation in Euler Angles ZYZ;
    2. A painting that shows the shape of the robot.

4.2 inverseKinematics.m

function [] = inverseKinematics( P,A )
Parameters: 

    1. P: The position of the end-effector point;
    2. A: The Orientation of the last arm.
**Return Values: **none.
**Input Values:** none.
**Output Values:**
    1. Five angles corresponding the position and orientation of the robot
    2. A painting that shows the shape of the robot.

4.3 auxiliaryFunction1.m

function [P,A] = auxiliaryFunction1(Theta0,Theta1,Theta2,Theta3,Theta4)
Parameters:
1 Theta0: the rotation angle along the axis z1;
2 Theta1: the rotation angle along the axis x1;
3 Theta2: the rotation angle along the axis x2;
4 Theta3: the rotation angle along the axis x3;
5 Theta4: the rotation angle along the axis y1.
Return Values:

    1. P: The position of the end-effector point;
    2. A: The Orientation of the last arm.
**Input Values: **none
Output Values: none

4.4 auxiliaryFunction2.m

function [n1,n2,n3] = auxiliaryFunction2( x,y,z )
Parameters:
1.x: x axis of the end-effort point;
2.y: y axis of the end-effort point;
3.z: z axis of the end-effort point;
Return Values:

    1. n1: the rotation angle along the axis z1;
    2. n2: the rotation angle along the axis x1;
    3. n3: the rotation angle along the axis x2;
**Input Values:** none
**Output Values:** none

4.5 draw.m

function [] = draw( P3,P4,P5,rotationMatrix )
Parameters: 

    1. P3: the position of the origin point of frame x3-y3-z3;
    2. P4: the position of the origin point of frame x4-y4-z4;
    3. P5: the position of the end-effector point;
    4. rotationMatrix: the orientation of the end-effector.
**Return Values:** none.
**Input Values:** none.
**Output Values:** A painting that shows the shape of the robot.

entry.title: 葡萄牙留学签证
entry.content:
现在在葡萄牙了，前两天一直在办理葡萄牙的签证。实际上葡萄牙的签证在欧盟里算是最难办的。以下是一些简单的经验总结：
葡萄牙签证最好提前2到3个月准备，这样时间才不会紧张，如果你确定你的认证和双认证都会很顺利的话，可以提前一个半月准备。

###物品准备

####四个公正+双认证
注意这里的东西要先找到原材料，在去公证处做公正，再去做双认证。公正这个环节可以加急，按照自己的时间安排确定

  • 无犯罪证明的公正和双认证
  • 在读证明的公正和双认证
  • 父亲或母亲一方的工作证明的公正和双认证
  • 父亲或母亲一方的财产证明的公正和双认证

####护照及其复印件（有效期要覆盖你的出国时间）

####户口本原件、复印件及翻译件

####身份证原件及其复印件

####个人存款证明（大于6w）

####双方学校协议书的复印件

####对方学校的offer

####对方学校提供住宿的证明（可以在你的offer里面，不过要写清楚）

####对方学校的使馆函

####在读学校的使馆函

####保险（覆盖你的出国时间）

####机票订单（晚于你的签证时间）

####申根签申请表（大使馆官网下载）+2张护照照片

拿着这些东西，去大使馆（要提前了解使馆开放签证的时间，使馆不是随时都为你服务的）就好啦，注意葡萄牙是送签，不是面签，所以只要材料准备全了就一般都会给过，可以同时让对方学校给这边的签证官发邮件。这样大概会加快进度。送签之后原则上来讲签证下来的时间是10个工作日，实际上会快一些～不到半个月就能拿到签证了

entry.summary:
现在在葡萄牙了，前两天一直在办理葡萄牙的签证。实际上葡萄牙的签证在欧盟里算是最难办的。以下是一些简单的经验总结：
葡萄牙签证最好提前2到3个月准备，这样时间才不会紧张，如果你确定你的认证和双认证都会很顺利的话，可以提前一个半月准备。

###物品准备

entry.title: Hazelost
entry.content:
Write an article with your name.
Cuz she is the only one you loved.
I would like to know what you were feeling.
However, I am not feeling good.

I never asked how you were getting together
& how you got separated.
You disappeared in the Haze.
And she lost on street.

When she finally found her way,
& you stay in muse.
She showering the sunrise.
and you still in the gaze.

I got a raspberryPi
and named it Hazelost
I found your Haze,
and finally lost.

So it’s gonna be forever
Or it’s gonna go down in flames
You can tell me when it’s over
If the high was worth the pain

Cause we’re young and we’re reckless
We’ll take this way too far,
It’ll just leave you breathless
Or with another nasty scar

By Cater
Fri. Jan. 16th, 2015
